revised_title: A Reevaluation of Dr. Fenton Evans' Fungus of Malaria Research
tldr: This article critiques Dr. Fenton Evans' research on the pathogenic fungus of malaria, questioning the identification of the fungus as a highly organized and unique species. The author suggests that the fungus may have been a typical Mucor and that its appearance in the nutrient medium was likely due to experimental error.
